title: OPPO F17 Pro (Metallic White, 128 GB)  (8 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Headset, USB Cable (1m, White), Adapter, SIM Card Pin, Protective Case (Transparent TPU), Quick Guide, Warranty Card
product_specification.Sound Enhancements: Support Hi-Res Audio, Dirac Sound Effect, Integrated Decoding Chip
product_specification.Other Display Features: 90.67% Screen Ratio, 96% NTSC (Typ) Color Saturation, 20:9 Screen Proportion, Corning GG3+ Glass, 60 Hz Screen Refresh Rate
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G GSM: 850/900/1800/1900, 3G WCDMA: B1/B5/B8, 4G LTE FDD: B1/B3/B5/B8, 4G LTE TDD: B38/B40/B41
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: 48MP + 8MP + 2MP + 2MP Rear Camera Setup, 48MP Main Camera (1/2 inch, f/1.7, 0.8μm, 6P), 8MP Wide Angle Camera (1/4 inch, 1.12μm, f/2.2, 5P), 2MP Mono Camera (1/5 inch, 1.75 μm, f/2.4, 3P), 2MP Mono Camera (1/5 inch, 1.75 μm, f/2.4, 3P)
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 16MP + 2MP Selfie Camera Setup, 16MP (f/2.4) + 2MP (f/2.4), CMOS Sensor (4-in-one Pixel Technology), Corning GG3+ Lens Glass Material
product_specification.Flash: Rear LED Monochrome Temperature Single Lamp
product_specification.Sensors: Geomagnetic Induction, Light Induction, Proximity Sensor, Acceleration Sensor, Gyroscope, Support Step Function
product_specification.Other Features: 1866 MHz RAM Frequency, OTG Storage Format: FAT32, NTFS, EXTAT, Maximum Support for OTG Storage: 256 GB, Number of RAM Channels: 2, WLAN Display, Bluetooth Codec Support SBC, AAC, aptX, aptX HD, LDAC, Bluetooth Shared Network, Face Unlock, Fingerprint Under Optical Screen, Facial Recognition, Fingerprint Payment, VOOC 4.0 with Fast Charging Support, Flash Charging (30W), Graphite Heat Dissipation, Black Screen Gestures, Smart Phone Calls, Lift Up the Bright Screen, Three-finger Screenshot
product_specification.Warranty Summary: Brand Warranty of 1 Year Available for Mobile Including Battery and 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Sleek and Lightweight Build: Featuring a thickness of 7.48 mm and a weight of 164 g, this sleek and lightweight smartphone does not feel bulky and offers a premium feel. The 220° smooth rounded edges further make it a delight to hold and use this phone. It comes with a 20:9 aspect ratio, making it comfortable to use this phone.
product_description.Stunning Full HD+ Display: This smartphone from Oppo features a 16.34-cm (6.43) Full HD+ Super AMOLED screen, with a resolution of 2400x1080 pixels, to offer a stunning, clear, and cinematic viewing experience. The mini dual punch-holes, with a diameter of 3.7 mm, help enhance the viewing area, making it a delight to watch videos and play games. Furthermore, you can quickly and securely unlock this amazing smartphone in just 0.3 seconds, thanks to the in-display fingerprint sensor 3.0.
product_description.Impressive Design: The striking design of this Oppo smartphone is sure to grab the attention of onlookers. This phone is fingerprint resistant, ensuring it will look stunning at all times.
product_description.Breathtaking Photos: With this smartphone in your hand, you can click professional-quality photos and record amazing videos with ease. This phone features a total of 6 AI portrait cameras (quad-rear cameras and dual-front cameras), so you can capture breathtaking portrait pictures, anytime and anywhere.
product_description.Portrait Photography Made Easy: This smartphone comes with features, such as AI Super Night Portrait, AI Night Flare Portrait, and AI Color Portrait, which is sure to make clicking photos a whole lotta fun.
product_description.Capture Beautiful Photos: With amazing features, such as Dual Lens Bokeh, AI Super Clear Portrait, and AI Beautification 2.0, you can click stunning pictures which are sure to leave your social media followers in awe.
product_description.Ultra Clear Mode: You can click crystal-clear pictures of a person, object, or the surroundings on this phone, thanks to the Ultra Clear mode.
product_description.Record Stunning Videos: If you’re a vlogger or would like to explore vlogging as a hobby, this phone will be the ideal one for you. The front and back cameras of this Oppo smartphone allow you to record smooth and steady videos, making it a delight to shoot amazing 4K videos on it, so you can showcase your passion to the world. Moreover, the Slow-Motion and Bokeh Video features help take your passion for recording videos to the next level.
product_description.Long-lasting Battery: Hosting a massive battery, this smartphone from Oppo offers a battery life of up to 10 hours. This phone’s 30 W VOOC Flash Charge 4.0 technology lets you recharge it fully in about 53 minutes. If you're short on time, a quick 5-minute charge can offer you a talk time of up to 4 hours.
product_description.AI Night Charging: Thanks to the AI Night Charging feature, this Oppo smartphone can be charged overnight without any worries. This feature ensures that your phone is charged to 100% with battery optimizations at an AI-determined morning wake time.
product_description.Power-saving Mode: Even when this Oppo smartphone’s battery is too low, you can still access up to six apps, thanks to the Super Power Saving Mode. Turn on this mode, so you can make a quick call, book a cab, or send a text to your loved one, even when the phone's battery is about 5%.
product_description.Powerful Processor: Featuring a powerful MediaTek Helio P95 processor and 8 GB of RAM, this phone makes it easy for you to seamlessly multitask between apps, play graphics-rich games without experiencing lag, and more. The internal storage space of up to 128 GB lets you store multiple apps, photos, videos, and more. The MediaTek HyperEngine technology takes your mobile gaming experience to the next level.
product_description.Operating System: Enjoy a seamless and intuitive user experience as this smartphone runs on the ColorOS 7.2.
product_description.Anti-lag Algorithm: This algorithm helps minimize screen stuttering and freezing, making it a delight to use this phone.
product_description.Air Gestures: You can answer calls without even touching the phone or using voice commands as this Oppo smartphone can recognize air gestures from as far as 20-50 cm. All you need to do to activate this feature is by lifting your hand upwards.

review:
The things I like:

Phone looks Premium.
Camera is Decent.
AI mode is helpful.
Portrait mode has many features.
Videography Excellent..
Support Video Background Blur in both front and rear camera.

Memory management is good.

Nothing is bad in this mobile but need improvement in camera.
Exposure is very high which makes image whitish.

OPPO should work on more free themes.
Quality of the free themes are not good..

1. Processor is fast for normal use, I don't play games so don't know how it works in heavy use like gaming. 2. I like phone look & design most, it is 1 of the slimmest & lightest phone I come across. 3. Camera quality is good. 4. Battery drain little fast but charger is so strong that it get charge very fast also. In normal use with watching movies and songs battery last for 12 hours approximately. 5. Display is awesome, it's pleasure to watch movies in it and headphone which oppo is giving will give you theatre like feeling. Put together u will not regret after buying this.

Very happy with the purchase. The phone came with things like good transparent phone cover, screen guard, charging adapter for fast charge, earphones original Oppo make.... Couldn't ask for more... The battery gets charged from 15% to 85% in 25 minutes flat.... 4015 mAH battery is a little less, but still compensated by fast charging facility.
Face recognition unlock, two apps open at a time, rolling screenshots etc., are additional features.... Close your eyes and buy this phone

This is just a over priced camera. And not a phone at all. There are connectivity issues and I would suggest to not purchase oppo phones from Flipkart. I raised a complaint within the 7 days policy and they are only wasting time by arranging tech visits. The technician who came is such a annoying guy and was asking for my other phones to check the network issue. When I said, I am facing problem with this phone and not with other phones then he said, sir your issue is a random one and only Flipkart can provide replacement. When contacted Flipkart, they arranged another visit the same day. Now, My money is wasted. It would have been better if I had bought it from local store. Trust me, you will be safe if you don't buy oppo phones from Flipkart. The replacement policy is just a gimmick
